issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I set the properties "top" and "left" to the test button. I added to my test a change button which sets properties "bottom" and "right" to the test button by clicking against it. When i clicked the change button the position of test button not changed. 
Detail. Test button is into label object.
Detail2. If I set properties "bottom" and "right" first and then try to change position of button by setting properties "top" and "left" it will works.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Incorrect work of properties "bottom" and "right"
